actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: We find two of our heroes on the second floor, staring blankly to the right, doing nothing.

actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: Realizing they are doing nothing, and no one else is around to help them do even more nothing, they decide to leave Perkins and go somewhere INFINITELY BETTER,

actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: like the Main Green or Keeney.

actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: Let’s say Keeney. Keeney’s a pretty chill place. Good people.

actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: (TIP: Use the W/A/S/D keys or the Directional keys to move the Perkinites around!)
